name: Bonk 3: Bonk's Big Adventure
overview: OH NO!! NOT AGAIN?!! Aaaagh!! What's that Evil King Drool doing back in the Dinosaur Kingdom?! Didn't we get rid of him last time? Guess not, huh? Now it's up to our skull-splitting, head-butting, rock-smashing, monster-bashing prehistoric hero Bonk to put an end to Drool's dastardly deeds once and for all. So go ahead and Bonk your way through the ultimate bash-o-rama .....Bonk 3 !
